summary: Mod doing more powerful and balanced a Destruction school magica in Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
By Uncle Pootis aka ololo2281337

v1.1

This mod simple adding 1 new function in the 5 perks school of Destruction Magic. This function added ONLY for youre Dragonborn more spell of destruction damage, when you have perks Novice\Apprentice\Adept\Expert\Master Destruction.

Setup: put the ESP. file in skyrim\data

You need for mod - Skyrim.esp, Update.esp

Mod on the russian language:

1 - http://tes-game.ru/load/skyrim/zaklinanija/11232/43-1-0-13880
2 - http://tesall.ru/files/file/8315-sila-razrusheniya/
3 - http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/magija/destruction_power_92_sila_razrushenija/277-1-0-21383

Good Luck!
author: Uncle Pootis aka ololo2281337
